item.title: Joe Brown - Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Jools Holland - 2008_UGC
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Billie Eilish - i love you
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Easy
I Love You - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am Cmaj7 Dm F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or single strums
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Chihiro Otsuka - Baby Mine
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Dm, G7, F, Cmaj7
From Dumbo (2019 Motion Picture)
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/LyqCyg853Fs
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Shawn Mendes - Señorita
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: Am, Cmaj7, F, Em, G
As performed by Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/-ADxekOsPqA
Want the intro TAB in PDF format? Visit: https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/2019/06/22/tab-for-senorita/
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from motionbolt.com. The "clean" version of the song (use in schools may still not be appropriate) is from Polar Records (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FjC5XHyK7hE)
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff

Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Memphis Ukulele Band - Merry Christmas Broken Hearts
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by The Memphis Ukulele Band. A new release for December 2018! Special thanks to the Memphis Ukulele Band for allowing me to make a play along of this song!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.

item.title: Johnny Cash - Thirteen
item.description:
Performed by Johnny Cash Written by Glenn Danzig
Note: The D chord is actually D/A but as the nice people at the ukulele-chords.com let us know: "Altered bass note is already part of the un-slashed chord, it does not make sense to play it on a ukulele."
Also Cmaj7 can be played as a regular C but the former is the one JC uses.
